title: As a BOC Admin, I want employee DOB hidden for Clubs unless the employee is assigned to their Org
custom_steps:
Note: DOB on Employee Profiles will now work similarly to SSN

AC:

* Club users will not be able to view the DOB field on employee profiles if the employee is not currently assigned to their Org
* It will not appear in the header or in the bio info section
* Club users will not be able to view DOB on unassigned/free agent employee profiles

title: Change First Name on Advance Consent Widget to "Roster First Name"
custom_steps:
Expected: Advance Consent Widget displays Roster First Name of Player

Actual: Advance Consent Widget displays Legal First Name of Player
